mapper.insert: insert into ec_import_log (import_cd, import_time, import_obj_typ, file_nam, file_typ, import_sts, file_ttl_row, succeed_qty, failure_qty, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{importCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{importObjTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileTtlRow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{succeedQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{failureQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_import_log set import_time = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, import_obj_typ = #{importObjTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_nam = #{fileNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_typ = #{fileTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, import_sts = #{importSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_ttl_row = #{fileTtlRow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, succeed_qty = #{succeedQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, failure_qty = #{failureQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where import_cd = #{importCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select import_cd, import_time, import_obj_typ, file_nam, file_typ, import_sts, file_ttl_row, succeed_qty, failure_qty, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_import_log where import_cd = #{importCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select import_cd, import_time, import_obj_typ, file_nam, file_typ, import_sts, file_ttl_row, succeed_qty, failure_qty, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_import_log

select import_cd, import_time, import_obj_typ, file_nam, file_typ, import_sts, file_ttl_row, succeed_qty, failure_qty, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_import_log where import_obj_typ = #{importObjTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by time_stamp desc
